title: Mathieu van der Poel Wore a $300,000 Luxury Watch When He Won CX Worlds, Coz, Why Not?
content:
Van der Poel takes Richard Mille timepiece for a trip through a filthy French field; meanwhile, Wout's Garmin goes AWOL.

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel Wore a $300,000 Luxury Watch When He Won CX Worlds, Coz, Why Not? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
